Text: Sorry, I've been having computer trouble.  Starting tomorrow EST, this will be the only file uploading on my computer.  Sorry.
Can someone seed? There are like 10 people stuck at 99.8%, including myself.

Next time, please at least include English subtitles for the hearing impaired. They are also good for people who don't have English as their first language. Subtitles take up hardly any extra space and they make for more seeders because the torrent is useful to more people.
